Pre-Game Insights: England will lock horns against USA in their final match of the Super 8s stage in the ongoing T20 World Cup 2024. England has two points from two games – with one defeat and one victory. The Three Lions started strong with a win against co-hosts West Indies but then lost against the Proteas. The defending champions will thus need to churn out a win to keep their semi-finals qualification hopes alive.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch at the Kensington Oval in Barbados is a good pitch offering equal assistance to both batters and bowlers. As the game progresses, expect the pitch to get slightly sluggish pitch and can benefit the pacers using cutters and slower balls.
The maximum temperature is expected to be around 32°C with 40 percent chance of rainfall.
Others: USA probable Playing XI: Steven Taylor, Andries Gous (wk), Nitish Kumar, Aaron Jones (c), Corey Anderson, Milind Kumar, Harmeet Singh, Shadley van Schalkwyk, Nosthush Kenjige, Ali Khan, Saurabh Netravalkar.
ENG probable Playing XI: Phil Salt, Jos Buttler (c) (wk), Jonny Bairstow, Moeen Ali, Harry Brook, Liam Livingstone, Sam Curran, Jofra Archer, Adil Rashid, Mark Wood, Reece Topley.
